sentence.Network_en: Kratos: The oracle spoke of Pandoras Box, can it be real?
sentence.Network_cn: 克瑞托斯: “祭司谈到了潘多拉魔盒, 那是真的 吗 ?”

sentence.Network_en: Narrator: After a thousand years, Pandoras box was, at last freed of its confines.
sentence.Network_cn: 讲述者: 逾越千年之久, 潘多拉的魔盒, 最终终于自由了.
